alert.note: Alert for Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 3:51PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Fremont County through 415 PM MDT... At 351 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles north of Pavillion, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Fremont County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
